deposit.description-2: This value of {networkCode} may change between now and the time we receive your payment. A small fee will be applied!

bet-slip.invalid-odd: The odd is invalid. Please refresh the page to try again.

bet-slip.default-stake-warning: Stake must be between {min} and {max}, which are the minimum BET/EAT and your maximum allowed stake.

race-detail.placed-tooltip: Winners of this market are selections that ran in the top positions specified.

Livechat.rules-tooltip-1: Do not harass or insult other users
Livechat.rules-tooltip-2: Do not beg, ask for loans, trivias or tips
Livechat.rules-tooltip-3: Do not insinuate Unibit has bad intent ('scam site' etc)
Livechat.rules-tooltip-4: Do not spam or post non-Unibit links
Livechat.rules-tooltip-5: Do not advertise any form of trading, buying or selling services
Livechat.rules-tooltip-6: Do not share or advertise your referral code
Livechat.rules-tooltip-7: Do not ask to become a staff member
Livechat.rules-tooltip-8: Respect mods, admins and other users
Livechat.empty-chat: Be the first to send a message!

BetCenter.title: Bet Center
BetCenter.error-no-channels: There are no channels available for this race

Step1.description: How to Add Bot to Telegram
Step1.description1: Here’s a quick tutorial to help you add a bot to your Telegram account.
Step1.description2: Notes: Make sure you are logged into Telegram on the device that you are using.
Step1.description3: Click on the “Add Bot” hyperlink provided in the pop-up.

Step2.description: Once you click the hyperlink, it will open in a new tab.
Step2.description1: Click on the “Open in Web” button.
Step2.description2: (if you are using Telegram in a web browser)
Step2.description3: Click on the “Open Telegram Desktop” button.

Step3.description1: If you can see the newly added bot as below, the bot has been added successfully to your Telegram account.
Step3.description2: Notes: You might be required to click on the “Start” button.
Step3.description3: Once you tap the hyperlink, your Telegram app will open.
